context: Hello there. I am looking for goo science fiction movies like Arrival (2016) Can you help?
Hi yes! Give me one moment! Have you seen Shut In (2016) Or what about Life (2017)?

resp: Okay. They might be worth checking out Also, there is Earth to Echo (2014)
